keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCPAR

Class RuleBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Associative_Classification.ClassifierCPAR.RuleBase

  • public class RuleBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the representation of a Rule Set
    Since:
    JDK1.5
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Written by Jesus Alcala (University of Granada) 09/02/2010

        Default Constructor

      • RuleBase

        public RuleBase(DataBase dataBase,
                myDataset train,
                int K)

        Parameters Constructor

        Parameters:
        dataBase - DataBase Set of training data which is necessary to generate a rule
        train - myDataset Training data set with information to construct the rule base (mainly, the training examples)
        K - int Number of best rules to use in prediction
